previous.name: Another Discourse on the Second Absorption, Etc.

segments.pli: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhattuddesako na sammannitabbo.
segments.en: “Mendicants, a person with five qualities should not be appointed as meal assigner.

segments.pli: Chandāgatiṃ gacchati, dosāgatiṃ gacchati, mohāgatiṃ gacchati, bhayāgatiṃ gacchati, uddiṭṭhānuddiṭṭhaṃ na jānāti.
segments.en: They make decisions prejudiced by favoritism, hostility, stupidity, and cowardice. And they don’t know if a meal has been assigned or not.

segments.pli: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhattuddesako na sammannitabbo.
segments.en: A person with these five qualities should not be appointed as meal assigner.

segments.pli: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhattuddesako sammannitabbo.
segments.en: A person with five qualities should be appointed as meal assigner.

segments.pli: Na chandāgatiṃ gacchati, na dosāgatiṃ gacchati, na mohāgatiṃ gacchati, na bhayāgatiṃ gacchati, uddiṭṭhānuddiṭṭhaṃ jānāti.
segments.en: They don’t make decisions prejudiced by favoritism, hostility, stupidity, and cowardice. And they know if a meal has been assigned or not.

segments.pli: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhattuddesako sammannitabboti.
segments.en: A person with these five qualities should be appointed as meal assigner.

segments.pli: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhattuddesako sammato na pesetabbo … pe … sammato pesetabbo … bālo veditabbo … paṇḍito veditabbo … khataṃ upahataṃ attānaṃ pariharati … akkhataṃ anupahataṃ attānaṃ pariharati … yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye … yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ sagge.
segments.en: A person with five qualities who has been appointed as meal assigner should not be called upon … should be called upon … should be known as a fool … should be known as astute … they keep themselves broken and damaged … they keep themselves unbroken and undamaged … is cast down to hell … is raised up to heaven.

segments.pli: Na chandāgatiṃ gacchati, na dosāgatiṃ gacchati, na mohāgatiṃ gacchati, na bhayāgatiṃ gacchati, uddiṭṭhānuddiṭṭhaṃ jānāti.
segments.en: They don’t make decisions prejudiced by favoritism, hostility, stupidity, and cowardice. And they know if a meal has been assigned or not.

segments.pli: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhattuddesako yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ sagge”ti.
segments.en: A meal assigner with these five qualities is raised up to heaven.”
